6.Name: www.summerfell.com
6.Author: Reaper
6.Description:
A module being built by players FOR players. Veterans of Player vs. Player, Role Play, Action Adventurers all coming together on one world, one dream. To provide the best of everything into one package. This is a freeform world built to give players what they want, not what they will settle for. 

PVP areas, and secure non pvp areas for peaceful adventuring. The server also includes a seperate area (completely seperate from the persistant world) for testing out builds and level up. This helps newer players "test" builds before they make them in the Persistant World of the module. Summerfell also has support and discussion forums for players to keep in touch with each other or to report and discuss server issues.

Found in the "Action" section of Gamespy
24.56.19.69:5121

9.Name: Beldin PWC
9.Author: Keyna Fearthegn
9.Description:
Beldin, sometimes called the City of Adventurers, is set at the mouth of the Karen River--west of Luskan, and south of the Spine of the World. The people of the Karen Valley have long sent out calls to the rest of the Realms to help them with the threats which constantly threaten them in the north--from the Goddess Auril, to the creatures of the Abyss. 

Since patch 1.23 came out, there has been no need for a pwc pack. The gameworld description is here: Link

13.Name: Uber Castle(PVP).PWC. FILES
13.Author: SpyHit
13.Description:
This is the PWC file, for joining the module "UBER CASTLE(PVP)"
Put the PWC file you just downloaded in your: documents\Neverwinter Nights 2\pwc folder.

DO NOT LOOK IN YOUR GAME INSTALL FOLDER C:\programfiles\Neverwinter Nights 2\. OR WHERE EVER YOU INSTALLED THE GAME, YOU WILL NOT FIND ANY PWC MAP OR FILES THERE, INSTEAD LOOK IN documents\Neverwinter Nights 2\pwc and put it there !!!

This is a PVP, Duel and FIGHT module for fun, made for UBERS(or at least I have tried...) I build this module for fun as an beta or test version, it will be updated later on(I think...)

Credits and respect goes to: Heras The H*** B**** (Heras The Hell Bitch), for making the 2DA, the Heras Uber Package, Silent Hill Armor, e.t.c. therefore many of the armors you will find in the module is build over Heras, Silent Hill Armor. 

Credits and respect goes to all the creators of some of the scripts that i used, most of them from the old Neverwinter Night(NWN1).

Credits and respect goes to MYSELF, for making the module, and the weapons(it has been a couple of years since i played Neverwinter Nights 1, as UBER, I am a little rusty.)

Credits and respect to all I have forgotten..........And to all players.
remember to have fun, UBER is about learning, and showing respect, having fun, and try things out(at least it is for me...)

SpyHit

Please note that you will also need the City of Eros hak to enter.

Updated 2:00pm CST, Jan. 24newspaper, Guilds for each class, a Royal Guard, player tournaments, 



The City of Eros is an adult, sexually-themed server located under the Social tab. Persistent mail system, persistent, player-run in-game theater performances, a pleasant inn with attached restaurant, DM-run quests and ongoing story lines are just some of the many features Eros has to offer.


Visit http://nwnhaven.com for more information.

54.Name: Amber Worlds Training Hall .PWC
54.Author: Sharklike
54.Description:
This is the PWC file for playing on Amber Worlds arena/training hall module.
Put the PWC file in your: My Documents\Neverwinter Nights 2\pwc folder.

Our project is a part of the intarget game portal. While we are working on a huge PW module based on R. Zelazny's Amber 
Novels, you can test your character builds in our training hall and fight with other players on the attached arena.

The module has all the functionality a training hall would require: leveling, changing alignment, fighting grounds,
 adjusted scripts, item balance, monsters, local boss, etc.

You can get the 20th level immediately, or you can test your build developing your character from the 1st level and getting experience 
points by fighting monsters in special locations.

There is also a special area where you can fight for score, if you want to. Finally, you will find crafting workbenches 
where you can learn how to craft different things in NWN2.

Have fun and feel free to visit our forum if you have any questions, comments, or suggestions.
http://forum.intarget.ru/index.php?showforum=71

55.Name: Waterdeep Peristent World Revived
55.Author: Marklos
55.Description:
Welcome to the original Waterdeep. From the beginnings of NWN1, this server was one of the largest. Now in the throes of rebirth through the marvelous NWN2 toolset, it's back. I'll be updating the .pwc regularly.

Scripts from mail system, banking system, binding point system, combat training, etc.

Come and see for yourself. I hope you enjoy your time here.

Located in Gamespy under Roleplay as Waterdeep PW, module name Waterdedep_v017, servervault, no password. Server is up 24/7.

Worldgate link. Right click and select save as. Then place it in your install directory for worldgate, e.g. c:\worldgate\worldgate

Then, run the worldgate client, choose new, and select "From file" and choose that file you downloaded. It will configure it for you.

Link

63.Name: Abeir-Toril _Alpha & Omega (AO) in the beginning
63.Author: alen_swift
63.Description:
ALL WELCOME...using PWC v5.13 as of 24 November 08 ..You need the pwc file and one hak to play... instructions in HELP FILE... ; )and current updates

Alpha and Omega (AO for short)in the beginning !!WARNING, some areas are large, and might take time to enter, and or , you just might not have enough Ram to play , sorry!!

This game is not a game for people who dont like to think, you need to find your way around the areas.

you start the game on a island of the Gods, and need to find your way off of it.

You make your own Legends.

The AO PW is up 24/7 although RP it can be found under Alternative, and has adout 75+ areas so far to get lost in.

AO in the beginning, is a pw were you dont have a history,as you were just created by the gods, it is a new world.
past civilezations were all wiped from existance, altough some may have survived, and you might find some clues of the past.

The game is lead by the players, and their actions,PVP,PVE, i.e. you want a home, cave to livein, a camp, a fort, village, town, city kingdom, Empire, so you find Cutter the Builder and ask him to build you one, he might ask you do do a quest though.

the players make the story the DMs in the game are the god you choose to worship, you dont need a god if you chose, but dont ask a dm/god for help
the gods can only help the followers of their religon or cult and are not allowed to bother other cult worshipers.

The pw has nothing to do with any realms of D&D and it is being made by the gods and evolution. 

we are looking for a Dev team.

the intent is to be roleplay, not hak and slash with out reason and not adout the xp and power gamming. 

We are working on it and adding things Frequently,, so look for the most reacent update around.

ADDED: Player owned housing, player owned shops, BANK banking system.

(( LET ME KNOW IF YOU HAVE PROBLEMS PLEASE))
((Please look for the most current update at LINK ))

HERE IS ALSO A STEP BY STEP HOW TO USE A PWC FILE FOR PLAYERS............

71.Name: Darkplane PW Mod
71.Author: Darkbolt Melesk
71.Description:
Due to some set backs in the recent year production of this module has been delayed. But!! we are now back on track and ALMOST done this module.

 It is my hope that we can release this module very soon. I am very excited about it release and i hope that this module will be the best one around. We have put a HUGE amount of work into this mod to make it REALLY nice for players.

 Due to some major set backs in 2008 we had to delay the completion of the Darkplane module. But now i am back on the project and i am finishing up the rest of the module. It is my hope that we can release this before the new year but no promises.

 WE NEED:
#1- Experienced scripter that can create scripts for ideas we have/may have. We are looking for some one that is WELL versed in the art of nwn2 scripting as this project in VERY advanced and requires a good scripter.

 If this sounds like you then we need you :D there are many ways to contact me and if you wish to be apart of a ground breaking module then contact me via the following info.

WE HAVE:
#1- TEAMSPEAK 24.67.92.77:8767--This is your best result voice comunication we have a dedicated 24/7/365 teamspeak server for modders and gamers alike. My teamspeak server is FREE for anyone to join. All you need do is have an admin register you.

#2- E MAIL darkboltantipk@hotmail.com
 This is my e mail from where you can contact me about a scripting position. I would prefer you use the teamspeak as it is a more efficient way of communicating but if you can not use teamspeak then this is your alternitive.


 For now i have released some new screen caps of the work on some new areas ect ect... If you like what you see then give us a shout and join my team as a scripter. Or if you are just curious and wish to know more about this module then come on in to teamspeak i would be more then happy to answer any questions you may have.


Darkbolt Melesk--Teamspeak host/module creator/Lead designer/scripter

83.Name: Pravita - PWC
83.Author: Stormrazor2000
83.Description:
Pravita � a resort for sensual pleasure. Indulge your deepest desires. (Adults only.)

Our local vault server allows you to bring your fully-realized and customized character.
Custom clothing, armor, and weapons are available, as well as leveling, for those who do not wish to customize their character prior to entering. Our scripted emote system allows bending over, kneeling, and lounging on the floor in addition to the usual emotes. Our Master/slave system allows forced emotes and binding to equipment. Beds are walkable and layable. Summon monsters in the arena, ranging from low level creatures to those who will provide a challenge for a group of level 20�s.

 Please visit and register on our forums at [url]http://www.pravita.net.[/url] (Please note we have a two-step forum registration process. You will not be able to read the majority of the forums until you have completed both steps.)

84.Name: Elenien - Die letzte Feste
84.Author: Quintarius
84.Description:
Persistente Welt in Faerun

Konzept: 
RP: Eine volle Rollenspielwelt mit minimaler Begrenzung durch die SL. Der Kampf wird genauso selbstverständlich sein wie das Handeln und friedliche Miteinander in der Befestigung der Dorfstadt Elenien. 
Umgebung: Es wird eine befestigte Menschenstadt(Dorf) geben, eine gut im Wald versteckte Elfensiedlung, eine tiefe Zwergenbinge sowie Orks, Goblins und andere Wesen die den Spielern das Leben schwer machen wollen doch ist es ausdrücklich jedem selbst überlassen ob er sich als Held/Bösewicht gibt, als Schurke in der Stadt sein Unwesen treibt oder als Geschäftsmann(frau)/Hausfrau(mann)/Trödler sein Leben bewältigt. 
Magie: Kleriker aller guten Gottheiten sind willkommen, den nach den Orkkriegen haben sich Krankheit und Verletzungen breit gemacht. Magier werden mit skeptischer zurückhaltung beobachtet aber nicht verfolgt. Hexer/Hexenmeister sollten sich entweder gut als Magier tarnen oder sich zurückhalten, den ihre ungebändigten Magien hat das ein oder andere Haus in Schut und Asche gelegt. 
Magische/Besondere Gegenstände: Es wird darauf geachtet das Charaktäre nur (magische/verbesserungs)-Gegenstände besitzen die vom Wert einem +((CharLevel-2)/3)Schwert (normal gerundet) endsprechen. 
Handwerk: Es gibt Lehrmeister für alles mögliche, von Magie bis Schneidern. Es ist euch freigestellt ob ihr Held oder Händler sein wollt. Niemand wird gezwungen werden sich einer Horde Orks endgegen zu stellen, sofern man sich nicht zuweit von dne Wegen abwendet!)

85.Name: Legends of the Dalelands PWC File
85.Author: BigMacDaddy
85.Description:
These are the .pwc and Override files for the Legends of the Dalelands Persistent World.

The .rar file is currently a 88.4Mb download and the expanded .pwc will require 340Mb to be available on your computer's hard drive. There is a "Read Me" file on how to install the items (the .pwc, .tlk and Override files) in the download onto your computer. Proper placement of these items is imperative to you being able to log on to the server. 

If players wish to use the DMFI tools available to them in game, you will also need the DMFI user interface. This is not a mandatory item to join the server. It can be downloaded from here: 

Link

The current .pwc version is:

Legends_of_the_Dalelands_beta_v06

*******************
**** 06/29/2007 ****
*******************
NwN2 v1.06 update.
Several script system changes have been put into play.

-------------------- 

BigMacDaddy 

VISIT OUR SITE: 
Link 

JOIN OUR FORUMS! 
Link

89.Name: Ruunwald PWC
89.Author: Thagon
89.Description:
Client file needed to test the Ruunwald proof-of-concept server.

The 1st large area for Ruunwald is complete, so we'd like to get a few testers on. Right now it's one large 32x32 area with many dungeons and quests.

We'd like some independent folks to hop on and test out the existing systems before we bulldoze ahead :)

The Concept: A "mini" MMO-style PW designed for between 5-10 regular players. Plot/RP oriented, but with plenty of casual/solo friendly content.

Ruunwald can be found in the PW Story room of Gamespy.

This updated version is for NWN2 version 1.05 (you need 1.05 to run properly).

Battlefield NWN is a module based on the popular FPS Battlefield 1942 and it's sequels. Capture flags, defeat enemies on the opposite team and amass tickets to defeat the enemy team. This module has bots, so, even if the server is empty, you can have fun.

102.Name: NWNUO (2) PWC File
102.Author: Moradin the Soul Forger
102.Description:
A few of you have asked to take a look at what I've got working so far, so I'm posting a PWC to allow access to the server. Please note that this is not ready for use yet and is early stages of developement.

Also, This is NOT going to be The SAME old NWNUO. There are some very large changes being done...to begin with, I'm currently looking at permanent death, if you are not ressurected. No more resets to the hall...

I'm rebuilding the craft system using the Bioware crafts, so that too will be very different.

Hak paks will be used from the start. Currently, Cory Sponseller's "My Samurai is Fight" hak is being used to add eastern flavored armor and a custom Loadscreen hak is in use. I found that I could not build some of the caverns with the base toolset tiles, so I opted to use Ar Pharazon's cave roof Hak. Others will be added as they become available in haks rather than overides.

> A RPG Game with high action parts.
> An amazing environment for a real roleplay.

104.Name: Legacy of Vastar PWC
104.Author: ~fenixphire~
104.Description: This is the CLOSED beta PWC file. If you are interested in joining, please visit Link and send fenixphire a PM so she can set give you proper access. The server is password protected during closed beta testing, so you will not be able to join without PMing fenix.

105.Name: Planewalker
105.Author: DeNevers
105.Description:
This localvault module is more or less a spiritual successor to Grimrider's Planescape: Sigil server for Neverwinter Nights 1.

Intended audience:
Adventure
Exploration
Mature
PvE
Roleplay

Location: In the Local Vault, Role-Play category on Gamespy

Until more areas are done, it's a Sigil-based tavern where you can meet and roleplay with others coming from all around the multiverse.

Rule changes
Some ruleset changes are involved, the most notable are:

* Re-vamped Genasi (you will need to create them with the same 2da files the module uses, else they'll be illegal).

* The addition of Camb's lizardman, ogre and pixie as playable races.

* The server uses an item filter. The item power cap is level 20, and generally bonuses are capped at +5. Higher bonuses will be tweaked to cost too much for level 20 items.

* NWN1's Damage Resistance and Damage Reduction are disabled, in favor of NWN2's material-based damage reduction.

* player1's Spell Fixes Compilation is in effect, so your spellcasting experience will be less buggy.


**Server online, mostly testing stuff out**

You will need to create a new character with the Character Creation Module (provided in the links below) for it to be legal online.

This server makes extensive use of the 3C - Music Pack override. You don't need it, but you will find most areas are very quiet and lack ambience without it.

Download links are listed below.

To uncompress the archives you will need a recent WinRar version or this program: Link

You will need also these files (links to their pages):

Link
 and Shirtless Saga Armor Pack 2 
Link

That's it for now!

112.Name: The Immortals
112.Author: Evliss
112.Description:
The Immortals is now using the autodownloader, so a PWC file is no longer necessary. However, many thanks to the vault for hosting some of the larger files needed by the autodownloader (these are the lzma files below). Also, I am keeping the PWC and haks here in the meantime in case I run into any difficulties and need to return to using a PWC.

The setting for The Immortals is the island nation of Celldara. Celldara consists of a loose federation of cities bound together by a tenuous treaty designed to assure their mutual survival and trade. Celldara's capital city is Coventry, and this is where your journey begins. Rumors abound regarding the ancient stone located at the city's center. Some claim that it possesses the power to grant immortality to those who are worthy, and just as many believe that notion to be pure fantasy. Travel this land if you dare. Great power and riches are to be gained by those bold enough to seek it out - and who knows, perhaps you will claim the greatest prize of all!

Find us on Gamespy under the "Story" category.

121.Name: Land of Immortals: Apocalypse
121.Author: LoIA Team
121.Description:
A brief overview of the story is as such: 

Directly following the events of Land of Immortals, an asteroid collided with the planet causing a drastic change in the worlds geography as well as climates. The lands know to the old world are blanketted in persistent winter. Those who survived the impact in the old world banded together and sent out an expadition into the crater left by the asteroid to assess what was there. The leader of the expadition was Daarnin, who subsiquently went missing after the chaos crystals were found in the crater. After the discovery of the Chaos Crystals, those on the expadition noticed they felt empowered in various ways. Also while on the expadition, the existance of two new nations on two previously unknown land masses became aparent. The two other nations (House Ineo of Silvaterra and the Liberius Legion of Incendia) also found the chaos crystals and met the expadition in the crater. Naturally, the Legion chased the expadition back to Divenium as the power of the crystals was aparent to them as well. While that was happening, House Ineo took this oppertunity to begin to take the chaos crystals for themselves. The Liberius Legion became aware of this and started an attack on House Ineo territory south of the crater. Upon the remnants of the expadition from Divenium returning they told of the power of the crystals and Winterfall was officially founded in order to fully pull the nation together. Zarieth was then negotiated with to be the defender of the entrance to Divenium from the crater. The other two nations followed suit and the war for the crystals was on. Over a period of eight years, large groups of people were cast out of each nation and are reffered to as Outcasts. These are a collection of people who were near the outskirts of each nation nearest to the crater which absorbed some of the energies of the asteroids impact. They were subsiquently cast out of each nation due to their "mutations". Subsiquently any and all persons banished by each nation are sent to the crater to await their fate at the hands of the creatures. The outcasts banded together generally to form a non centralized tribal society. They are not a nation unto themselves, but may gain that later on in the story told through the expansions. Until then they are the bastards of each nation and are kill on site to everyone, even themselves (they have no reputation mind you, lawless nomads effectively). 

Each nation has its own look and feel as well as history and agenda's. 

Features of this expansion/revamping are: 

Nation vs. Nation based PvP: 
Players of each nation square off against each other to conquer territory. Upon character creation, players select what nation their character will join. 

Raids: 
Each Nation has a treasury that other nations may attempt to raid to steal vital resources the nation through randomized automated vault raids.

Nations are Dynamic: 
The Nation leader or Co-Leader may upgrade the troops in each territory owned by the nation, increase their level of training, pay the upkeep on their troops (done automatically if the nation has enough money), etc. to ensure their nations and its people stay safe. 

Bounty Hunters: 
Players may take on the roll of a Bounty Hunter to hunt the enemies of different nations for Reputation, Gold, and the experience of the hunt. 
Completely Randomized Loot: 
Loot is randomly generated based on the CR of the mob that dropped it and is reminecent of Guild Wars/Diablo 2 style naming conventions. 

Look: 
Each region (Silvaterra, Incendia, Divenium, and Daarnin's Crater) each have a unique geography. 

Nation Histories: 
Each nation has a distinct and unique history that will help mold the quests and agenda's of the Nation. 

Reputation: 
Players through their actions will gain or lose reputation with each of the nations. Reputation is used to determine the Characters rank, access to nation items, and other assorted things (Quests, buffs, etc.) 

Chaos Crystals: 
Nations compete for control of each of the nine Chaos Crystals in Daarnin's Crater. These crystals provide constant enhancements to characters of the nation that controls each particular crystal. These enhancements are random and are set each time the server starts. 

Loot: 
All loot is customly generated upon mob spawn. Thanks to Utimagus, there are millions of possible loot spawns. All with the posibility of having a prefix noun and suffix. 

Crafting: 
Just added!!! You are now able to tear off prefixes suffixes and nouns off an item, and then place that onto another item. "Simply Amazing" as our testers called it. 

Vampire and Vampire Hunters: Players are able to complete one of two quest lines to become either a vampire or vampire hunter. Both come with different perks and detriments. Vampires naturally must feed on either monters or players. If players are bitten, they will become vampires if they do not cure themselves in time.

Transitionless Area: Ever find it odd that you run to a set point to get to another area that seems to defeat the point of immersion? So did we, so we got rid of them all. The world is now seemless as you run from one area to another without the constrictions of AT's.

This is just a rough run down of the server. To learn more, hop over to Link . This server adds a completely different dynamic to nwn2. Come give us a try, we guarantee you'll enjoy your experience here. 

We support the autodownloader and all you need to do is either direct connect to fnasoft.com or find us in the PW Action category.

137.Name: Tales of Moonsea
137.Author: ToM DM Team
137.Description:
Tales of the Moonsea is centered around the ruined city of Phlan as it struggles to rebuild in 1373 Dale Reckoning. It is a chaotic and wild city on the frontier of civilization in the Moonsea. Swathes of the city are still controlled by bands of monsters. A great temple to Tyr, the Waiting, tries to guide the city forward spiritually as it contends with the burgeoning power of the local priests of Bane.

Phlan itself is governed by a loose Council under the guidance of a mayor. Politics are rife with secret deals and betrayals as various forces good or sinister vie to control the future destiny of Phlan.

Into this mix come many adventurers eager to make a name for themselves. They'll have the option to battle monsters while reclaiming lost sections of Phlan, or they can enter politics and navigate the treacherous waters of Phlan's ruling class. Any path is possible for those with the strength to pursue it in Tales of the Moonsea.
